citation.abstract: The aim of this study was to compare the efficacy of indirect and combined bypass surgery for treatment of adult moyamoya disease (MMD). The definition of combined bypass surgery is a combination of superficial temporal artery-middle cerebral artery (STA-MCA) anastomosis and indirect anastomosis. Development of collateral circulation after surgery was investigated.
citation.journal: Journal of cerebrovascular and endovascular neurosurgery
citation.title: Angiographic results of indirect and combined bypass surgery for adult moyamoya disease.

author.name: Cirugía
author.description: Herramienta para buscar, compartir, revisar y referenciar autores latinoamericanos que contribuyen a fortalecer la literatura médica de Latinoamérica
